entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
